title: Minecraft Java版 1.15 Pre-Release 2 发布
author: Halcyon_Suoh
txt_content:
预发布版是Minecraft Java版的测试机制，如果该版本作为正式版发布，那么预发布版的游戏文件将与启动器推送的正式版完全相同。
然而，预发布版主要用于服主和Mod制作者的预先体验，如果发现重大漏洞，该预发布版会被新的预发布版代替。因此建议普通玩家持观望态度。
Minecraft 1.15 仍未发布，1.15-pre2 为其第 2 个预发布版，第 16 个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



Minecraft 1.15 Pre-Release 2
Minecraft 1.15 Pre-Release 2
A Minecraft Java Pre-Release
Minecraft1.15预发布版
Edit: We've now released the second pre-release.
第二版预发布版现已发布

Changes in 1.15 Pre-Release 2
1.15第二版预发布版改动

Tweaked chunked loading performance calculations性能优化Setting the respawn point by using a bed now shows a message使用床重设出生点时现会有聊天栏提示

Added stats for anvil and grindstone interaction counts统计现会计入铁砧及砂轮的使用次数

Fixed bugs漏洞修复


Fixed bugs in 1.15 Pre-Release 2
Fixed bugs in 1.15 Pre-Release 2

MC-19413 - Horse tries to “finish” pathfinding when you interrupt it by riding itMC-19413 - 被驯服的马在寻路过程中被玩家骑走后仍会试图回到其寻路终点MC-33285 - Summoning slimes with custom maxHealth attributes does not workMC-33285 - 使用/summon指令生成史莱姆时，maxHealth属性不生效MC-83003 - Barrier particle not visible if barrier block is in offhandMC-83003 - 将屏障置于副手时，屏障粒子不会显示MC-83051 - Spectral/Potion arrows/Channeling tridents apply effect to EndermenMC-83051 - 光灵箭的发光效果/药水箭的药水效果/带有引雷魔咒的三叉戟的雷/会影响末影人MC-94421 - Shooting an enderman with a bow and arrow or trident will play arrow or trident collision sound and subtitlesMC-94421 - 使用弓箭/三叉戟击中末影人会播放箭:击中/三叉戟:突刺字幕及其对应声音MC-94491 - Pressing ESC in world settings returns to main menu instead of world listMC-94491 - 在"创建新的世界"菜单及其"更多世界的选项"子菜单中点击ESC会导致你回到标题界面，而非选择世界界面。MC-124280 - Using fire charges on TNT in creative mode consumes the fire chargeMC-124280 - 创造模式中使用火焰弹点燃tnt会导致火焰弹被消耗MC-129781 - The trident will hit the ground after hitting the endermanMC-129781 - 三叉戟击中末影人时会被"弹开"MC-147865 - Elder Guardian particle is displayed too high (over the player’s head)MC-147865 - 粒子"minecraft:elder_guardian"显示位置过高MC-155591 - Foxes can spawn in giant spruce taiga, but not in giant tree taigaMC-155591 - 狐狸不会在巨型针叶林群系生成MC-157212 - Trusted fox hostile AI seems to be broken. Foxes ONLY defend players from mobs that shoot arrows, but ignores mobs that uses melee attacks and projectile entites that are not arrows.MC-157212 - 狐狸不会攻击对它信任的玩家造成近战伤害的怪物MC-162531 - Player sneaks while sleeping if there’s a lantern two blocks above the bedMC-162531 - 当床上第二格方块是灯笼时，使用该床会导致玩家躺着潜行

MC-163234 - Flying near the top of honey blocks/soul sand in creative slows down flight speedMC-163234 - 蜂蜜块/灵魂沙的表层会减慢玩家飞行速度MC-163411 - All entities but players and items do not produce particles when sliding down honey blocksMC-163411 - 除玩家外的实体滑下蜂蜜块时不显示蜂蜜块粒子MC-163665 - Cooldown overlay is solid whiteMC-163665 - 冷却时间指示器丢失透明度 
MC-163776 - Items thrown at the side of a Honey block will keep their horizontal trajectory despite slower speedMC-163776 - 被丢到蜂蜜块上的物品仍保留其水平方向动量MC-163942 - Name tag in mini horse inventory model doesn’t billboard properlyMC-163942 - 马/驴/骡子/羊驼物品栏内其模型会显示名字条MC-163944 - Honey block particles are always produced at the player’s feetMC-163944 - 滑下蜂蜜块时，蜂蜜块粒子会在玩家脚部位置产生，即使玩家脚部并未与其接触。MC-164163 - Glowing mobs stop glowing when invisibleMC-164163 - 隐形实体不发光MC-164368 - Travelling back from Nether creates a new portal in a random location.MC-164368 - 从地狱回到主世界会在随机位置创建一个新的地狱门MC-164706 - Nausea effect makes breaking animation render incorrectlyMC-164706 - 反胃效果会导致方块破坏粒子渲染不正常MC-165242 - Hand animation is shown when trying to use a fire charge in waterMC-165242 - 试图在水下使用火焰弹仍会播放手部动画MC-165515 - Smooth lighting does not work for beds and double chestsMC-165515 - 平滑光照在床/箱子上不生效MC-165586 - Creeper and lit TNT flashing is different than beforeMC-165586 - 苦力怕与点燃的TNT实体的闪烁效果不同以往MC-165959 - Something completly breaks texture packsMC-165959 - 资源包错误MC-166004 - Getting too close to an end gateway causes the game to crashMC-166004 - 接近末地折跃门会导致游戏崩溃MC-166068 - Default texture minecraft:entity/conduit/open_eye causing mipmap to drop from 4 to 3 when using Programmer Art texture packMC-166068 - 使用Programmer Art资源包会导致Mipmap等级从4降为3MC-166097 - The maximum height of 1*1 jungle tree becomes 10 instead of 12MC-166097 - 1*1粗的丛林树只能长到10格高


正版启动器下载地址Windowshttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msiMac/OSXhttps://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmgLinux/其他https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.tar.gz
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注 Minecraft 1.15（这是什么更新）特性列表的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。Java版的启动器下载地址在上文已经提供。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
